level.heading: Payment of benefits.
level.text: The payment of benefits under the retirement programs under § 1-626.05(2) and (3) shall be in accordance with the applicable provisions of §§ 401(a) and 457 of the Internal Revenue Code [26 U.S.C. §§ 401(a) and 457].

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-27
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-27, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-621.02.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: Sections 401(a) and 457 of the Internal Revenue Code referred to in this section are classified as 26 U.S.C. §§ 401(a) and 457, respectively.
